Test Steps.Step Expected: Template Field Search Page must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify that the following search fields are displayed on the page
 
1.Name-Text field
2.Type-Drop down
3.Status-Drop down
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user should be able to perform a search and retrieve results using the search fields

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Name field, enter the first few characters of the existing Template field \n Name followed by "%" (e.g. id%) and hit "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Names beginning with those first few characters entered mut be displayed in search results
Must clear all search fields and return to the default list\n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Name search field, enter "%" and then any few characters of the existing Name followed by another "%" and then the last few characters of the name field  (e.g. %CU%E)and hit "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the names that finish with those characters and contain those characters entered must be displayed in search results
Must clear all search fields and return to the default list

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Name search field, enter the first few characters of the existing Name followed by "%" and then any few characters that the name contains, followed by another "%" (e.g. T%PL%)	and hit "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Names that begin with those characters and contain those characters entered must be displayed
Must clear all search fields and return to the default list

Test Steps.Step Action: From the Type  search criteria dropdown select a 'Type' and click "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Corresponding records must be displayed in search results

Test Steps.Step Action: From the Status search criteria dropdown select a 'status' and click "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Corresponding records must be displayed in search results

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify that the grid results display the following 
Actions(Edit, Delete)Name
Source
Type
Status
Value
ADD(Button)
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.All columns must be sortable in both ascending and descending order.\n2.Actions must have Edit and Delete options
Paging must be implemented.
Must navigate to Template field-Add Page

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify that the data entered on the Add page is displayed correctly on \nTemplate field-Search Page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Correct Data must be displayed
Notification Template Field Search Page must be displayed
Notification Template Add Page must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify below sections are displayed under Template tab
 1.Transaction Data
 2.Configuration Data
 3.Special Data
 4.Static Data
 5.Image
Test Steps.Step Expected: The respective sections should be displayed under the "Template" tab

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify below fields are displayed under Configuration tab\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n
A read-only field to uniquely identify the template
Drop down must display two values 'Client' and 'Base'
The text box must allow alphanumeric characters, as well as the symbols &, /, \ , _ , and -
Drop down must display two values 'Full' and 'Snippet'

Drop down must display below values
"DRAFT"
"PUBLISHED"
"INACTIVE"
System must allow the user to specify a file path for storing output files Ex:/notification/PRT/samples
System should accept valid class names in the correct format \nEx: com.civixapps.shared.notification.handler.sample.SamplePrintNotificationHandler

1.Text field allows the input of up to 80 characters\n2.Text field must allow 80 alphanumeric and special characters (&, /, \, _, -) \n3.The text field does not accept any input beyond the 80-character limit

1.Text field must allow the input of up to 500 characters\n2.Text field must allow alphanumeric and special characters (&, /, \, _, -) \n3.The text field does not accept any input beyond the 500 character limit
Must allow input

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter valid data in all mandatory fields and hit "Save"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must Save the template data successfully.Verify the saved template is displayed in Notification Template search screen.\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter valid data in all mandatory fields and hit "Cancel"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must discard the changes and return to Template search screen.

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Drag and drop functionality for transaction data
Test Steps.Step Expected: The correct placeholder template field must be dropped without distortion or errors.

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Drag and drop functionality for Configuration data
Test Steps.Step Expected: The correct placeholder template field must be dropped without distortion or errors.

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Drag and drop functionality for special data
Test Steps.Step Expected: The correct placeholder template field must be dropped without distortion or errors.

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Drag and drop functionality for static data
Test Steps.Step Expected: The correct placeholder template field must be dropped without distortion or errors.

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Drag and drop functionality for Image
Test Steps.Step Expected: Image must be dropped without distortions

Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Select a notification and click on take action
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system displays the preview action
The system displays the notification preview

Test Steps.Step Action: Click and select the new Notice Of Action
Test Steps.Step Expected: The system displays the Noctice Of Action selected

The system displays the selected Notice of Action applied to the notification.                                                               The system displays the changes on the preview.                                                                                                  The system retains the selected Notice of Action until a new one is selected.

The system displays the notification preview

The system displays the selected Sent Date applied to the notification.                                                               The system displays the changes on the preview. Test Steps.Step Expected: Fields accept input correctly.
\nThe user returns to the Notification Run Request Search page.The newly added notification request appears in the grid with the status 'Completed'.\n

The notification request details are displayed correctly.

Test Steps.Step Expected: \nThe file is downloaded successfully.Open the downloaded file and verify the data.The file contains correct details of the notification reques\n
